i know its there but i need the code so i can use like a whip with a stone and get a party hat lol just a example

item.title: Need a basic code
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:2, topic:132132”]Should have this but if you dont here:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType); } } } } }

now:

public void NewObjects() { // Mod Adam (non laggy!) objecttimer = 40;
MAKE A OBJECT CODE

makeGlobalObject(xcoord, ycoord, objectid, 0, 10); //Fighter Torso Mini Game Portal[/quote]

Lol, he said item on object. Openice, go to case 192 for that in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Need a basic code
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

Should have this but if you dont here:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType); } } } } }

now:

public void NewObjects() { // Mod Adam (non laggy!) objecttimer = 40;
MAKE A OBJECT CODE

makeGlobalObject(xcoord, ycoord, objectid, 0, 10); //Fighter Torso Mini Game Portal

Read full topic
